description: T1 Cherry tree: Crown reduction by 2m on all aspects.Reasoning: To manage overall size, prevent excessive top growth, and maintain a balanced structure.T2 Cherry tree: Crown reduction by 2m on all aspects and  Remove two lower secondary limbs to facilitate pedestrian access.Reasoning: To manage overall size, prevent excessive top growth, and maintain a balanced structure.Raising lower branches for clearance over footpathT4 Sycamore: Re-Pollard back to previous points of reduction.Reasoning: Routine maintenance. T5 Willow (neighbours tree No.29 Batoum Gardens W6 7QB) :  Lateral reduction back to boundaryReasoning: Preventative Risk Reduction: Reducing height to mitigate the risk of failure by removing weak, compromised branchesT7 Crab Apple: Crown Reduction by 1.5m on all aspectsReasoning: Keeping the tree at a manageable height to avoid future excessive pruning.T11 Dead Cherry: Fell Reasoning: DeadT12 Ash: Remove secondary limb leaning over football pitch and reduce remaining canopy by 3m on all aspectsReasoning: Crown Reduction & Reshaping ??? To manage overall size, prevent excessive top growth, and maintain a balanced structure.T13 Maple: Re-Pollard Reasoning: Routine maintenance. T14 Oak (Neighbours tree No.145 Sulgrave Rd W6 7PX) Reduce laterally back to boundaryReasoning: Routine maintenance.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
